tjc.model.tick

Class Tax

  • java.lang.Object
    • tjc.model.Randomiser
      • tjc.model.tick.AbstractTick
        • tjc.model.tick.Tax

  • public class Tax
extends AbstractTick
    Performs per tick actions for a tax model, inheriting from the abstract tick class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tax(World world, float taxRate, float taxIncrement)
      Constructor, calls the AbstractTick constructor, sets the world, tax rate and increment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float getTaxRate()
      Getter for the current tax rate
      int tick()
      Overridden method, Increments the tax rate by the weekly fraction of the tax increment variable, loops through and updates agents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tax

        public Tax(World world,
           float taxRate,
           float taxIncrement)
        Constructor, calls the AbstractTick constructor, sets the world, tax rate and increment
        Parameters:
        world - The world in which the simulation is running
        taxRate - The initial tax rate
        taxIncrement - The amount by which tax increases per year

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public int tick()
        Overridden method, Increments the tax rate by the weekly fraction of the tax increment variable, loops through and updates agents.
        Overrides:
        tick in class AbstractTick
        Returns:
        The number of the tick that has transpired for comparison against a maximum tick

        public static float getTaxRate()
        Getter for the current tax rate
